text:
I've stood on this stage so many times now,
it's gotten pretty easy to do, you know～

Yeah yeah, once you get used to it, even if you're not into it
you sort of get attached or something
Kind of like you're at home?

Anything wrong?
You seemed kind of spaced out, are you okay?

If your fine then that's alright...
So about the unit's positioning ────
I said to shut up didn't I...

Ah, ahh...
Anyway, I've confirmed that there are no problems.
